description: The apply operation applies a PlanDefinition to a given context
name: Place

parameter.documentation: The patient that is the target of the plan to be applied
parameter.name: patient

parameter.documentation: The encounter in context, if any
parameter.name: encounter

parameter.documentation: The practitioner applying the plan definition
parameter.name: practitioner

parameter.documentation: The organization applying the plan definition
parameter.name: organization

parameter.documentation: The type of user initiating the request, e.g. patient, healthcare provider, or specific type of healthcare provider (physician, nurse, etc.)
parameter.name: userType

parameter.documentation: Preferred language of the person using the system
parameter.name: userLanguage

parameter.documentation: The task the system user is performing, e.g. laboratory results review, medication list review, etc. This information can be used to tailor decision support outputs, such as recommended information resources
parameter.name: userTaskContext

parameter.documentation: The current setting of the request (inpatient, outpatient, etc)
parameter.name: setting

parameter.documentation: Additional detail about the setting of the request, if any
parameter.name: settingContext

parameter.documentation: The CarePlan that is the result of applying the plan definition
parameter.name: return

text.div:
Place

OPERATION: Place

The apply operation applies a PlanDefinition to a given context

URL: [base]/PlanDefinition/[id]/$apply

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INpatient1..1Reference

The patient that is the target of the plan to be applied

INencounter0..1Reference

The encounter in context, if any

INpractitioner0..1Reference

The practitioner applying the plan definition

INorganization0..1Reference

The organization applying the plan definition

INuserType0..1CodeableConcept

The type of user initiating the request, e.g. patient, healthcare provider, or specific type of healthcare provider (physician, nurse, etc.)

INuserLanguage0..1CodeableConcept

Preferred language of the person using the system

INuserTaskContext0..1CodeableConcept

The task the system user is performing, e.g. laboratory results review, medication list review, etc. This information can be used to tailor decision support outputs, such as recommended information resources

INsetting0..1CodeableConcept

The current setting of the request (inpatient, outpatient, etc)

INsettingContext0..1CodeableConcept

Additional detail about the setting of the request, if any

OUTreturn1..1CarePlan

The CarePlan that is the result of applying the plan definition
